channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Large amount of hedge over the pavement making it difficult for wheelchairs and pushchairs to get past, 31st July

item.title: Blocked Drain & Flooding, 31st July
item.description:
Blocked Drain & Flooding By The Children's Play Area On The Pavement & Road. This Area Has Been Like This For A Couple Of Months. It Is Making It Very Dangerous To Cross Because The Flow Of Water Resulting In Blocked Drain, Potholes, And Slippery On The Pavement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 191, High Street, Poverest, London

item.title: Tree blocking footpath, 31st July
item.description:
This tree on churchhill walk has almost entirley blocked the footpath. There is barely space for a person to walk through no space for a pushchair or wheelchair and the roots have pushed up the footpath making it dificult for the enderly and disabled

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Churchill Walk, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The bins that are there are not being emptied on a regular basis so people dump more rubbish next to it., 31st July
item.description:
People are dumping rubbish next to the bins because the black bins are not being emptied, the people who are responible for the bins cannot bring the bins in as they are waiting for them to be empited.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Heights, Charlton, London

item.title: Debris and paving slab in road, 31st July
item.description:
